author: Matthew J. Belvedere
title: What to watch today: Dow set to surge after a coronavirus drug reportedly shows effectiveness
description: The Dow is set to surge Friday on a report that said Gilead Sciences' drug Remdesivir showed effectiveness in treating Covid-19.
content:
BY THE NUMBERS
U.S. stock futures were pointing to a strong gain for the Dow at Friday's open on a report that said Gilead Sciences' drug Remdesivir showed effectiveness in treating Covid-19. Shares of Gilead were jumping over 10%. The Dow on Thursday bounce… [+6203 chars]
